## syncCerts() function

Synchronize certificates with a TLS server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function syncCerts(certs: Record<"ca" | "key" | "cert", string>, server: SetSecureContextInterface, opts?: LoadCertsOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  certs | Record&lt;"ca" \| "key" \| "cert", string&gt; | Object with paths to certificate files. |
|  server | [SetSecureContextInterface](./update-certs.setsecurecontextinterface.md) | Any interface that satisfies <code>SetSecureContextInterface</code>. |
|  opts | [LoadCertsOptions](./update-certs.loadcertsoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```ts
const server = https.createServer();
syncCerts({
 ca: "/path/to/ca.pem",
key: "/path/to/key.pem",
cert: "/path/to/cert.pem"
}, server);
```
